name: Grain to Gain
description:
Controls:
[WASD] to move
[QE] or [Left, Right Arrows] to rotate camera
[Left Click] to goto location
[Left Click + Hold] to follow mouse
[Right Click] to look at mouse location
[Right Click + Shift] to continually look at mouse location
[Scroll Mouse Wheel] to zoom in or out
[Scroll Wheel Click] to return to original zoom position
